item.title: #7 A Journey Through Time
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The sun peeks over the horizon, Saturday vibes and good news – the perfect combo. We’re about to spice up your weekend with a recap of all the awesome things we whipped up this week.

item.title: #6 Come for the conversation, stay for the culture
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hi, it’s @innno_ again. Summer is almost here. But don’t worry, this update is all about making your day more comfortable.

item.title: #5 Endure the hardship, delay the gratification
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings from Saigon, I’m here again, bringing you a lot of updates. There are big and small things brewing at Dwarves network.

item.title: #4 Finding Your Authentic Tribe
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome back to the #4 weekly digest after a long holiday. Those Discord channels are still buzzing with active messages. Without further ado, let’s see what I’ve got to share.

item.title: OGIF Office Hours #1: Markdown Presentations, Research Content Pipeline, and Professional Screenshots
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 74 minutes Recorded Apr 05, 2024 Summary Here’s a summary in the requested format: Meet the Server Owner: The event kicked off with an introduction to the server owner, known as econ-101.

item.title: OGIF Office Hours #2: Devbox as the new Docker, Security Standards, and Understanding Liquidity
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 79 minutes Recorded Apr 12, 2024 Summary Technical Deep Dives: hnh delved into the technical aspects of using devbox as a Docker replacement and why NixOS was a great choice.

item.title: OGIF Office Hours #3 - Generative AI, Tokenomics, and Finance Talks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 71 minutes Recorded Apr 19, 2024 Summary Generative AI Discussion: There is a significant focus on Generative AI, its applications, and its implications for the team’s projects.

item.title: #3 We All Start Somewhere
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Huge news is on the horizon. You absolutely will not guess what we’re about to share. We remember last week like it was yesterday, but what truly counts is that you’re here with us.

item.title: #2 Walk Around Learn Around
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There are so many amazingly fun and wonderfully weird things happening on Discord, both last week and of course, today. So let’s dive in with a freshly-brewed “cà phê sữa,” of course.

item.title: #1 What Do You Stand For?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Lock in Your Workspace. Show the World. Our Discord crew is buzzing with energy after our last Friday community call, with folks sharing snapshots of their workspaces.

item.title: Starting your journey at Dwarves Discord
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to Dwarves Network, We’ve grown a lot since launching our Discord server since the first day we made this network grow based on developers-centric.

item.title: Dwarves Community
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Community is melting pot for software engineers, thinkers, learners and techies who are to explore, learn and master the latest advancements in technology.

item.title: $icy in 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Follow up on our recent post df protocol, $icy and $dfg. Since 2020, $icy has been a part of our workflow.

item.title: Community Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As you may know, Dwarves Discord network is where we connect with our friends, alumni, and like-minded people. Bounties are rewards (in ICY - Dwarves’ token) given out to community members for work that encourages community developers to get more involved in the development outside of their core skills.

item.title: Discord Roles
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To organize our discord and make it fun to interact between community members, we setup those roles for specific purposes. They are ladder-based and function-based roles.
